entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 12:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
